title: Help me identify these various fonts
content:
Hey guys. I need to translate a piece of advertising at my agency but the guys who were working on it before I arrived didn't leave the text editable. Could you help me identify these various fonts? I found one very similar for the "MAGICAL" image (SimpleLife) but I'd like to know the original font as well, if there is one.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [MAGICAL.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824142955/http:/typophile.com/files/MAGICAL.png) | 219.15 KB |
| [GRAPES.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824142955/http:/typophile.com/files/GRAPES.png) | 445.52 KB |
| [PRESSED.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824142955/http:/typophile.com/files/PRESSED.png) | 91.1 KB |
author: Typo-Maniac

comments.content:
Problem to me is 'MAGICAL' and 'PRESSED' look both hand-done (all repeating letters are different)...  
'PRESSED' is some kind of hand-drawn [Copperplate Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824142955/http:/typophile.com/wiki/http.myfonts.com/search/copperplate%2Bgothic).

Grapes, minus the initial G, is Adobe Caslon Italic:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/adobe-caslon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824142955/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/adobe-caslon/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/adobe-caslon/")

Didn't find an exact match for the initial G, but Notera and Abuelito are close:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/notera/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824142955/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/notera/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/notera/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/abuelito/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824142955/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/abuelito/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/abuelito/")

Pressed appears to be a distressed version of Copperplate Gothic, or possibly Copperplate Gothic Hand:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/copperplate-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824142955/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/copperplate-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/copperplate-gothic/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/copperplate-gothic-hand/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824142955/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/copperplate-gothic-hand/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/copperplate-gothic-hand/")

As for Magical, SimpleLife is very close. I didn't find anything as close in my search.
Yeah, they were modifed for the advertisement. Thanks for the advice on Copperplate Gothic, that one fits 'PRESSED'.
kthomps5: thanks a lot for those suggestions! I'm gonna try these at myfonts. As for "MAGICAL" I believe that it is indeed SimpleLife but modified.
